2+1.sig_info: The sight and smell of blood triggers Carnage’s bloodlust, granting a Power Gain Buff when activating a Bleed or Armor Break on the opponent that lasts as long as the Opponent is Bleeding or Armor Broken. The Power Gain grants up to 6 to 8.48% of a Bar of Power per second based on how close Carnage is to the opponent.

PASSIVE: The Carnage Symbiote changes form creating weapons and armor which provide Passive bonuses based on Carnage’s current needs.
Heavy Attack: Cruelty +1309.09 Critical Damage Rate
Carnage gains 50% additional Power from Striking his Opponent. This is reduced by 25% per Mutation Buff he has.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: Each time Carnage activates a Special Attack he begins to Mutate for 10 seconds.
Once his Mutation ends he copies his current Symbiotic Creation as a Permanent Buff.
Maximum of 5 Permanent Buffs.
CRITICAL HITS: If the target is already Bleeding or Armor Broken, gain a 100% Chance to Bleed dealing 4.07 damage over 0.50 seconds.
HEAVY ATTACKS: 100% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 72.15 Direct Damage over 15 seconds.
RAVAGER - PASSIVE: Carnage rips and tears at his opponents, each time he triggers a Bleed Debuff on his Opponent he has a 25% chance to Refresh the Duration of all the other Bleed Debuffs on his Opponent.
If a Bleed fails to apply due to an Immunity, Carnage has a 100% chance to Armor Break his Opponent, reducing their Armor by 1066.67 lasting for 10 seconds. The Armor Break doesn’t stack.
While his Opponent is Bleeding or Armor Broken, his Special Attacks become Unblockable.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: This attack receives 861.54 additional Critical Rating.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: This attack receives 1257.14 Critical Damage Rating.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 421.8 Direct Damage over 30 seconds.

2+2.sig_info: The sight and smell of blood triggers Carnage’s bloodlust, granting a Power Gain Buff when activating a Bleed or Armor Break on the opponent that lasts as long as the Opponent is Bleeding or Armor Broken. The Power Gain grants up to 6 to 8.48% of a Bar of Power per second based on how close Carnage is to the opponent.

PASSIVE: The Carnage Symbiote changes form creating weapons and armor which provide Passive bonuses based on Carnage’s current needs.
Heavy Attack: Cruelty +1350 Critical Damage Rate
Carnage gains 50% additional Power from Striking his Opponent. This is reduced by 25% per Mutation Buff he has.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: Each time Carnage activates a Special Attack he begins to Mutate for 10 seconds.

Maximum of 5 Permanent Buffs.
CRITICAL HITS: If the target is already Bleeding or Armor Broken, gain a 100% Chance to Bleed dealing 5.34 damage over 0.50 seconds.
HEAVY ATTACKS: 100% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 94.58 Direct Damage over 15 seconds.
RAVAGER - PASSIVE: Carnage rips and tears at his opponents, each time he triggers a Bleed Debuff on his Opponent he has a 25% chance to Refresh the Duration of all the other Bleed Debuffs on his Opponent.
If a Bleed fails to apply due to an Immunity, Carnage has a 100% chance to Armor Break his Opponent, reducing their Armor by 1100 lasting for 10 seconds. The Armor Break doesn’t stack.
While his Opponent is Bleeding or Armor Broken, his Special Attacks become Unblockable.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: This attack receives 888.46 additional Critical Rating.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: This attack receives 1296.43 Critical Damage Rating.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 552.9 Direct Damage over 30 seconds.

HEAVY ATTACKS: 100% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 1996.8 Direct Damage over 15 seconds.
RAVAGER - PASSIVE: Carnage rips and tears at his opponents, each time he triggers a Bleed Debuff on his Opponent he has a 25% chance to Refresh the Duration of all the other Bleed Debuffs on his Opponent.
If a Bleed fails to apply due to an Immunity, Carnage has a 100% chance to Armor Break his Opponent, reducing their Armor by 1400 lasting for 10 seconds. The Armor Break doesn’t stack.
While his Opponent is Bleeding or Armor Broken, his Special Attacks become Unblockable.

SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 11673.6 Direct Damage over 30 seconds.
